title: Proposal:Balancer liquidity pool migration to Uniswap
body:
# Proposal：Balancer liquidity pool migration to Uniswap

**Summary**

Migrate the ANC balancer pool to Uniswap, open the ANC/DAI market in order to improve the ANC liquidity.

**The Proposal**

This is a proposal to increase the ANC liquidity by migrating its Balancer pool to Uniswap.

The initial liquidity pools in Balancer include ANC, USDC and ANT, but it is more complex for ANC holders to supply the liquidity with three tokens and Uniswap is more popular and easy to use.

Uniswap only needs two tokens to create trading pool.

The whole ANC pool in Balancer [ANC Balancer Pool](https://pools.balancer.exchange/#/pool/0x8d4fb20be19656b30dea51e709209888e784ec04/) now (13:12 UTC+8) has 67800$ liquidity left.



![img](https://trello-attachments.s3.amazonaws.com/5aceaf1164c86a15f5956cda/5f4fa1fdc8672f234c60ae75/4001f6af5d8a1dcbcdda06420d8b09aa/image.png)

100 BPT is Aragon China's total balance and this balance will be migrated to Uniswap.

![img](https://trello-attachments.s3.amazonaws.com/5f1fe962146e708bfda57df2/5f93b9c1a7a976430f385fba/fcd19331a2a2154ba86d384b750d89c9/image.png)


- ANC: 1353.85

- ANT: 5159.46

- USDC: 17060.37



**How to migrate?**

Change ANC/ANT/USDC token to ANC/DAI, the ANC price for now is 25.12USDC(13:14 UTC+8)

- remove all these liquidity in balancer pool

- convert USDC to DAI

- convert ANT to DAI

- initiate the Uniswap Pool with the 1350ANC and 33912DAI
author: 0x1Bfe1F47a3566Ee904d5C592ab9268B931516B56
